rooms.description: Open plan living area that follows Vastu principles with the main door facing north for positive energy.
Separate dining space adjacent to the living room, ensuring smooth traffic flow.
Traditional Kerala kitchen with a central hearth and proper ventilation. Complies with Vastu guidelines by placing cooking area in a favorable direction.
Guest bedroom located near the entrance to provide convenience.
Primary bathroom with adequate privacy and ventilation. Placed in a less auspicious location as per Vastu norms.

openings.description: North-facing entrance aligned with Vastu principles for positive energy flow and security.

openings.description: Door to the two-car garage integrated into the ground floor plan.

openings.description: Multiple windows on east and west facades for balanced light distribution.
